name: Flow ERC1155
desc: An ERC1155 token that can be minted using any of the deployed Flow expressions. This token can be made conditionally soulbound by using the 'can transfer' expression.

methods.desc: Deploys a new Flow ERC1155 contract.

inputs.name: Uri
inputs.desc: A base URI for this contract's tokens.

expressions.name: Can transfer
expressions.desc: An expression that determines whether this token can be transferred. Mint and burns must be handled by the flow expressions.

cells.name: Caller
cells.desc: The contract or EOA that called transfer

cells.name: This contract
cells.desc: The address of the FlowERC1155 contract this expression is for

cells.name: From
cells.desc: The address this token is being transferred from

cells.name: To
cells.desc: The address this token is being transferred from

expressions.name: Flows
expressions.desc: The available flows for this token.
